Entries.winter_24{{YearRemainder}}: I wonder if my mom's going to get me something for Winter Star this year, or she'll forget again...$s

Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Mom used to bring me books she came across in gas stations.#$b#Generally simple, cheap romances, but I loved them all the same.

Entries.Mon8: Some days I still can't believe I'm no longer living in a trailer.$h
Entries.3_2: You'd think we wouldn't have so many dishes to do, considering the fact that Mom mostly lives off of TV dinners...
Entries.7_2: Gotta swing by the post office to pick up our mail today.#$b#What am I waiting for? Just a copy of the latest Homes and Gardens magazine.#$e#I'd love, love to decorate more, but I haven't the time. It's hard enough just keeping our home clean.
Entries.11_2: @, are you planning on seeing the new movie with %name Taylor?
Entries.13_2: If you weren't a farmer, @, what would you want to be?#$b#Me? I'm not sure. I think...I think I mostly want to be a mother.#$e#When I was a kid I wanted to be an archaeologist though.
Entries.14_2: Mom says I spend too much time taking care of her.#$b#I'm not sure how not to, though.$s
Entries.16_2: Mom brought me a book today. Said she picked it up at a gas station while she was out driving that bus.$h
Entries.17_2: We really should cook more, that'd be so much better for our budget over buying TV dinners.$s
Entries.18_2: $d joja#All the unhealthy food is so much cheaper at Joja over the fresh fruits and veggies.$s|Now that's Joja's closed, Mom's been shopping more at Pierre's. It's...good for the town, maybe, but not our budget.
Entries.19_2: Books have always been my escape from reality, @.#$e#No matter what was going on in my life, I could always disappear into a good book.

Entries.summer_Tue8: $d Joja#Gosh, it must be so hard for small businessowners like Pierre these days, with Joja expanding everywhere and vacuuming up the whole market.|I'm not sure Joja was ever cheaper than Pierre's when it came to nonprocessed food. Sure, calorie by calorie it's cheaper, but were those good calories?
Entries.3_2: When we lived in the trailer, Mrs. Mullner would let me do laundry in her washer.#$b#She's always been so nice to my mother and I.$h
Entries.4_2: I made some extra poppyseed muffins, @, do you want one?$h[651]
Entries.6_2: I have so much mopping I need to do.$s

Entries.3_2: Ugh, I hope either Mom or I get a raise soon, this inflation is brutal.$s
Entries.13_2: I was trying to cook {{Dish}} again recently, but it's much harder than I thought it would be.
